feed.title: Nautical Backup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.12.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.12.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/485
  • Update docker/login-action action to v3.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/460
  • Update docker/metadata-action action to v5.7.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/445
  • Update docker/build-push-action action to v6.16.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/444
  • Update dependency pydantic to v2.11.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/486

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.12.9...v2.12.10

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.13.0
entry.content:
What's New

Add new Enviornment variables when using EXEC here or here:

  • NB_EXEC_TOTAL_ERRORS - The total errors on the last run
  • NB_EXEC_TOTAL_CONTAINERS_COMPLETED - The amount of containers processed successfully
  • NB_EXEC_TOTAL_CONTAINERS_SKIPPED - The amount of containers skipped (for any reason)
  • NB_EXEC_TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_CONTAINERS - The amount of containers Nautical looked at

What's Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.12.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/487
  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.6.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/488
  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.6.14 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/489
  • Fix error when using lowercase LOG_LEVEL by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/491
  • Update docker/build-push-action action to v6.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/490
  • Update dependency python to 3.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/459
  • Access to backup status for POST_BACKUP_EXEC by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.12.10...v2.13.0
